entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 1:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: NNE 30 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
